content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** offers a robust solution for programmatically finding watermarks within various business document formats. Integrate our package into your {{EnvName}} applications to empower them with watermark finding capabilities.
content.step_1: To exploit the functionalities of our library, instantiate the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} class and provide the {{FileformatCap}} file path, file stream, or byte stream as input. This action loads the document for watermark analysis.
content.step_2: For targeted watermark identification, leverage the {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}} object. Specify an image for locating similar image watermarks. Alternatively, for textual watermarks, define the text content, font properties, color attributes, and other pertinent parameters to refine the search criteria.
content.step_3: Employ the {{TextSearchBold}} method of the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} object to initiate the watermark detection process within the loaded document. This function returns a collection of objects representing potential watermarks, enabling further processing.
content.step_4: The retrieved collection of watermark objects grants you precise control. You can programmatically remove unwanted watermarks or dynamically modify their properties, such as adjusting their size or text content, to suit your specific requirements.

more_features.title: Advanced Watermark Search Techniques Using C# with {{ProdShortName}}
more_features.description: Delve into powerful watermark searching capabilities using the {{ProdShortName}} C# API, tailored for developers within the {{EnvName}} platform.

feature_1.title: Streamlined Watermark Detection in C#
feature_1.content: Utilize {{ProdShortName}} to implement streamlined watermark detection within your C# applications. Benefit from advanced search functions to locate watermarks quickly and accurately.

feature_2.title: Precise Watermark Search with C#
feature_2.content: Enhance your document security protocols by precisely searching for watermarks in C#. Configure {{ProdShortName}} to find watermarks based on specific characteristics such as size, color, and placement.

feature_3.title: C# Integration for Effective Watermark Management
feature_3.content: Integrate {{ProdShortName}} into your C# projects to effectively manage document watermarks. Our API provides powerful tools to search, analyze, and report on watermark usage, ensuring compliance and brand consistency.

code_1.title: C# Example: Comprehensive Watermark Search
code_1.content: Explore this detailed example of how to use C# with {{ProdShortName}} for comprehensive watermark search capabilities, including handling multiple document types and complex search criteria.
code_1.comment_1: Initialize the C# application and prepare the document loading mechanism
code_1.comment_2: Set search parameters to target specific watermark attributes
code_1.comment_3: Perform the search across documents and gather watermark details
code_1.comment_4: Analyze and process watermark data for further administrative or compliance actions
